episodes.title: Inside the Love Has Won Cult
episodes.description: On April 28th, 2021, a man walked into a Colorado police station and told authorities that at his home address, they could expect to find a dead body inside. Upon entering the house, authorities couldn't have been prepared for what they were about to discover: a mummified corpse that was adorned with Christmas lights and a group of people caring for it, living around it, and worshipping it. Thank you to our amazing Patrons for supporting our show! We couldn't have done it without you. Also, a huge thank you to our sponsor SmartLabels! To find SmartLabels, go here: https://www.amazon.com/QR-Smart-Labels-Scannable-Organization/dp/B08XYR79G6?maas=maas_adg_06BC48178CB709EF5025B75A17F15C71_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas For exclusive content like mini episodes and case info, join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/odditiesonelmstreet To send in your stories for a chance to have them read on the podcast, send them to: listenertales@gmail.com To checkout Oddities on Elm Street merch: https://my-store-ee23b1.creator-spring.com Follow on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bobbiecurtislee/ Main TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bobbiecurtislee Personal TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bobbiecurtislee2.0 House TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@odditiesonelmstreet? --- Support this podcast: https://creators.spotify.com/pod/show/oddities-on-elm-street9/support
